name: Discounted Sales invoice
query:
select 
    `tabSales Invoice`.name as "ID:Link/Sales Invoice:100",
    `tabSales Invoice`.posting_date as "Date:Date:100",
    `tabSales Invoice`.sales_person as "Sales Person::100",
    `tabSales Invoice`.customer as "Customer::100",
    `tabSales Invoice`.customer_name as "Customer Name",
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:100",
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.item_name as "Item Name::100",
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.qty as "QTY:Float:100",
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.discount_percentage as "DISC:Percent:100",
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.price_list_rate as "Price List:Currency:100",
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.rate as "Price:Currency:100",
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:100",
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.brand as "Brand:Link/Brand:100",
    `tabSales Invoice`.status as "Status::100",
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.net_amount as "net_amount:Currency:100",
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.amount as "amount:Currency:100",
    `tabSales Invoice`.is_return as "Return::100"
from
    `tabSales Invoice` join `tabSales Invoice Item` on `tabSales Invoice`.name = `tabSales Invoice Item`.parent
where
    `tabSales Invoice`.docstatus = 1
    and `tabSales Invoice`.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
    and `tabSales Invoice Item`.brand = %(brand)s
